text: Wayne Radford (May 29, 1956 - January 11, 2021) was an American professional basketball player. He played the guard position. Raford was born in Indianapolis, Indiana. He won the NCAA Division I championships in 1976. From 1978 to 1979, Radford played for the Indiana Pacers. Radford died on January 11, 2021 at the age of 64.Wayne Radford, member of IUâ€™s 1976 national championship team, passes away at age 64 ==References== Category:1956 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Indiana Pacers players Category:Sportspeople from Indianapolis
title: Wayne Radford
